question: who is ricp?
answer: With RICP from The American College of Financial Services, MBA from Western New England University, BS from University of Florida, Lee Gibson MBA, RICP has 7 yrs of experience as a Investment Advisory Representative at Strategic Financial Advisors in Houston, Texas Area, 27 yrs 9 mos of experience as a President at The Company Store in Montgomery, TX, 3 yrs 5 mos of experience as a Agent at Bankers Life in Houston, Texas Area, 1 yr 4 mos of experience as a Financial Advisor at Merrill Lynch in The Woodlands, Texas, 5 yrs 7 mos of experience as a Promotions & Marketing Counselor at Stotts & Company in Houston, Texas Area and is proficient in Investments, Strategy, Business Development, Financial Analysis, Strategic Planning, Marketing, Leadership, Series 7, Retirement Planning, Management, Strategic Financial Planning, Customer Service, Negotiation, Operations Management, Financial Planning, Certifited Long Term Care.
